abstract: David Segal The Haggler column addresses pitfalls of magazine subscriptions, which will often continue to bill credit cards after introductory offers have expired.
snippet: A reader complains to the Haggler about the way her magazine subscriptions were renewed, and about the automated system that answered her call.
lead_paragraph: A reader complains to the Haggler about the way her magazine subscriptions were renewed, and about the automated system that answered her call.

headline.main: How Did This Become a Commitment?
headline.seo: Automatic Magazine Renewal, and Automated Voices
headline.print_headline: How Did This Become a Commitment?
